languages.text: {n}Эльдарка неопределенно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Твоим мон-кай пришлось хуже. Я буду жить, раны моей души однажды залечатся. Они тоже будут жить, но душа... Душа всегда будет кровоточить болезненными воспоминаниями".

{n}Yrliet shrugs uncertainly.{/n} "Your mon-keigh have had it worse. I will live, and the wounds of my soul will eventually heal. They will live, too, but their souls... their souls will forever bleed painful memories."
languages.original_text: {n}Эльдарка неопределенно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Твоим мон-кай пришлось хуже. Я буду жить, раны моей души однажды залечатся. Они тоже будут жить, но душа... Душа всегда будет кровоточить болезненными воспоминаниями".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari shrugs her shoulders uncertainly.{/n} "Your mon-keigh have had it worse. I will live, the wounds of my soul will eventually heal up. They will live, too, but the soul... Their soul will forever bleed with the painful memories."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari shrugs her shoulders uncertainly.{/n} "Your mon-keigh have had it worse. I will live, the wounds of my soul will eventually heal up. They will live, too, but the soul... Their soul will forever bleed with the painful memories."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特不置可否地耸了耸肩。{/n}“你的猴子朋友比我遭受了更加可怕的痛苦。我会活下去，我灵魂的伤口也终将愈合。他们也会活下去，但他们的灵魂……他们的灵魂将永远流淌着痛苦的回忆。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs uncertainly.{/n} "Your mon-keigh have had it worse. I will live, and the wounds of my soul will eventually heal. They will live, too, but their souls... their souls will forever bleed painful memories."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特不置可否地耸了耸肩。{/n}“你的猴子朋友比我遭受了更加可怕的痛苦。我会活下去，我灵魂的伤口也终将愈合。他们也会活下去，但他们的灵魂……他们的灵魂将永远流淌着痛苦的回忆。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet se encoge de hombros con incertidumbre.{/n} «Ha sido peor para tus mon-keigh. Viviré, y con el tiempo las heridas de mi alma sanarán. Ellos también vivirán, pero sus almas... sus almas siempre sangrarán dolorosos recuerdos».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs uncertainly.{/n} "Your mon-keigh have had it worse. I will live, and the wounds of my soul will eventually heal. They will live, too, but their souls... their souls will forever bleed painful memories."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet se encoge de hombros con incertidumbre.{/n} «Ha sido peor para tus mon-keigh. Viviré, y con el tiempo las heridas de mi alma sanarán. Ellos también vivirán, pero sus almas... sus almas siempre sangrarán dolorosos recuerdos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet hausse les épaules d'un air peu assuré.{/n} « Ce que vos mon-keigh ont vécu était bien pire. Je survivrai, et les blessures de mon âme cicatriseront un jour. Ils survivront, eux aussi, mais leurs esprits... seront marqués à jamais par ces souvenirs douloureux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs uncertainly.{/n} "Your mon-keigh have had it worse. I will live, and the wounds of my soul will eventually heal. They will live, too, but their souls... their souls will forever bleed painful memories."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet hausse les épaules d'un air peu assuré.{/n} « Ce que vos mon-keigh ont vécu était bien pire. Je survivrai, et les blessures de mon âme cicatriseront un jour. Ils survivront, eux aussi, mais leurs esprits... seront marqués à jamais par ces souvenirs douloureux. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet zuckt unsicher mit den Schultern.{/n} "Euren Chem-Pan-Sey erging es schlimmer. Ich werde überleben, und die Wunden meiner Seele verheilen irgendwann. Auch sie werden überleben, doch ihre Seelen ... ihre Seelen werden wegen der schmerzhaften Erinnerungen ewig bluten."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs uncertainly.{/n} "Your mon-keigh have had it worse. I will live, and the wounds of my soul will eventually heal. They will live, too, but their souls... their souls will forever bleed painful memories."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet zuckt unsicher mit den Schultern.{/n} "Euren Chem-Pan-Sey erging es schlimmer. Ich werde überleben, und die Wunden meiner Seele verheilen irgendwann. Auch sie werden überleben, doch ihre Seelen ... ihre Seelen werden wegen der schmerzhaften Erinnerungen ewig bluten."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは不安そうに肩をすくめる。{/n}「モン＝ケイはもっとひどい目に遭っている。我は生きていて、魂の傷はいずれ癒える。彼らも生き続けるだろうが、彼らの魂は…彼らの魂は辛い思い出に永遠に血を流すだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs uncertainly.{/n} "Your mon-keigh have had it worse. I will live, and the wounds of my soul will eventually heal. They will live, too, but their souls... their souls will forever bleed painful memories."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは不安そうに肩をすくめる。{/n}「モン＝ケイはもっとひどい目に遭っている。我は生きていて、魂の傷はいずれ癒える。彼らも生き続けるだろうが、彼らの魂は…彼らの魂は辛い思い出に永遠に血を流すだろう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, belli belirsiz omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Mon-keighlerin daha beterini yaşadı. Ben yaşayacağım, ruhumdaki yaralar da eninde sonunda iyileşecek. Onlar da yaşayacak ama ruhları... Ruhları ebediyen acılı hatıralarla kanayacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shrugs uncertainly.{/n} "Your mon-keigh have had it worse. I will live, and the wounds of my soul will eventually heal. They will live, too, but their souls... their souls will forever bleed painful memories."

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
